original_text: Then I was given a measuring rod like a staff, and I was told, “Rise and measure the temple of God and the altar and those who worship there,
korean_text: 또 내게 지팡이 같은 갈대를 주며 말하기를 일어나서 하나님의 성전과 제단과 그 안에서 경배하는 자들을 측량하되

sentences.original_text: Then I was given a measuring rod like a staff,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 지팡이 같은 측량 막대기를 받았고,

sentences.original_text: “Rise and measure the temple of God
